title: 2025 TV Premiere Dates : New & Returning Series On Broadcast , Cable , Streaming
body_text:
Here again is Deadline’s annual list of premiere dates for new and returning TV series. The roster covers hundreds of broadcast, cable and streaming programs debuting throughout 2025, including many still listed as TBA (to be announced). It includes series premieres and season debuts, shows returning from hiatus and some one-offs such as live sports and awards shows but not movies or specials.
Note that older premiere dates are listed at the bottom and that not all PBS outlets premiere their shows on the same day.
As always, we update this post daily as more dates are revealed, so check back often for the latest. We’re glad you tuned in. Additions or adjustments can be sent to editors@deadline.com.
Premiered so far in 2025:
Watch on Deadline
